body:
Has something changed in the binutils build lately that would cause this undefined reference (libintl_dgettext)?

My cbtf-krell build now fails with the latest develop branch, with no changes in my code.

Thanks for any clues on how to resolve.

Jim G

Partial build output:
/home/jeg/spack/opt/spack/linux-fedora19-x86_64/gcc-4.8.3/binutils-2.24-ncmqjaexykxcxxgh3cezjfpvnwvtw7rr/lib/libbfd.so: undefined reference to `libintl_dgettext'
collect2: error: ld returned 1 exit status
make[2]: *** [core/daemonTool/daemonTool] Error 1
make[2]: Leaving directory `/tmp/jeg/spack-stage/spack-stage-nNY8iB/cbtf-krell/build_cbtf_krell'
make[1]: *** [core/daemonTool/CMakeFiles/daemonTool.dir/all] Error 2
make[1]: Leaving directory `/tmp/jeg/spack-stage/spack-stage-nNY8iB/cbtf-krell/build_cbtf_krell'
make: *** [all] Error 2
title: libbfd.so: undefined reference to `libintl_dgettext'
